alfredsnippet.snippet:
J R Saul, The Unconscious Civilization, p.57

"The sign of a sick civilization is the growth of an obscure, closed language that seeks to prevent communication. This was increasingly the case with those medieval university scholars known as the schoolmen. This is the case today with those who wield the thousands of impenetrable specialist dialects."
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - Saul Identifies the Sign of a Sick Civilization
